mention.text: a method that automatically generates paraphrase sets from seed sentences to be used as reference sets in objective machine translation evaluation measures like BLEU and NIST
reference sets in objective machine translation evaluation measures like BLEU and NIST

the paraphrases produced in an experiment , i.e. , -LRB- i -RRB- their grammaticality : at least 99 % correct sentences ; -LRB- ii -RRB- their equivalence in meaning : at least 96 % correct paraphrases
